label: Higgs VEV from Hierarchy
wl_code:
(* Electroweak scale from Planck via geometric suppression *)
                MPl = 2.435 * 10^18; (* Reduced Planck mass GeV *)
                MGUT = 2.118 * 10^16; (* GUT scale GeV *)
                (* v_EW = M_Pl * exp(-π * Re(T)) where Re(T) ≈ 7.086 *)
                ReT = 7.086;
                vEW = MPl * Exp[-Pi * ReT];
                N[vEW, 5]
